sentences.english: The country is ruled by a group of army officers.
sentences.chinese: 这位军官今天上午派遣了一个团的兵力。

sentences.english: Army now has 40,000 soldiers in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 美军目前在德国驻有4万兵力。

sentences.english: The officer detached a regiment this morning.
sentences.chinese: 这位军官今天上午派遣了一个团的兵力。

sentences.english: We had ranged against us elements from several enemy divisions.
sentences.chinese: 敌军有几个师的兵力跟我们相对抗。

sentences.english: They double-team on one section of my army.
sentences.chinese: 他们用两倍兵力对付我的一支军队。

sentences.english: There just were not enough Confederate soldiers left to fight.
sentences.chinese: 南军兵力不足，所剩廖廖无几。

sentences.english: The correct strategy and tactics more important than superior force.
sentences.chinese: 正确的战略战术比优势兵力更重要。

sentences.english: Most of our forces have concentrated near the station.
sentences.chinese: 我们大部分兵力集结在车站附近。

sentences.english: The air defense troops assignments uses dynamic programming method to establish the numeric model.
sentences.chinese: 防空兵群兵力分配，运用动态规划方法建立数学模型。

sentences.english: Superior forces must be concentrated to destroy the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 必须集中优势兵力歼灭敌人。

sentences.english: Despite being greatly outnumbered, Liu Bei and Sun Quan eventually won the battle.
sentences.chinese: 尽管兵力悬殊，刘备和孙权最后还是打赢了这场战役。

sentences.english: So the larger the map is, the more scouting troops you should probably send.
sentences.chinese: 所以在大尺寸地图上，玩家最好多派些兵力实施侦察。

sentences.english: The secretary of defense briefed the president on the enemy's strength.
sentences.chinese: 国防部长向总统简略汇报敌人的兵力。

sentences.english: NATO officials have denied there are troop buildups along the border.
sentences.chinese: 北约官员否认在巴基斯坦跟阿富汗边境一带集结兵力。

sentences.english: The PLA men launched a converging attack on the enemy force in many column.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放军对敌人的多个纵队进行了集中兵力的进攻。

sentences.english: The troops distinction is an important step of the deployment.
sentences.chinese: 兵力区分是防空兵战斗部署的重要环节。

definition: to reinforce/to increase troop numbers/reinforcements/extra troops
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
